Для работы службы обслуживания Lenovo требуется установка Lenovo User Framework. После этого с помощью пароля Lenovo Вы сможете автоматически входить в аккаунт и гарантировать безопасность хранения данных (установка производится однократно, трафик не расходуется)

Lenovo User Framework не установлен. После установки с помощью пароля Lenovo Вы сможете автоматически входить в аккаунт и гарантировать безопасность хранения данных (установка производится однократно, трафик не расходуется)

Сообщение о подтверждении платежа не получено в течение длительного времени. Возможно, сервер занят или сеть недоступна. Проверьте состояние сети и дождитесь получения подтверждающего сообщения. По любым вопросам обращайтесь в службу поддержки XXXXXXXX

LenovoStore is the latest version. Thanks for your interest
Q: How to download the desired apps?

A: Click Download button on various pages to download your favorite apps. You can also click the icon on top right corner of the top toolbar to open the search page, enter the desired app name, such as SYNCit, in the search box, and click Search button to locate your desired app.
Q: How to set to download apps in WLAN only?
A: Click the menu item icon at top left corner on the top toolbar, select Setting, and select Download in WLAN only in the download settings.
Q: How to manage the apps installed/being downloaded in the device?

A: Click the menu item icon at top left corner of the top toolbar, and select App Management. In this page, you can view the installed, downloading, updated and favorite apps by category. In Download management, you can suspend, continue or cancel download tasks and view app details. In the Update, you can update and run apps and view app details. In the Installed, you can uninstall, manage and run apps and view app details. In Favorites, you can download apps, view app details and remove apps from Favorites.
Q: How to return to last operation page?
A: Click the Return key of the system.
Q: How to register a Lenovo ID?
A: There are two ways to register: Register on app.lenovo.com, the official website, or click [Login] on the menu bar of the LenovoStore client side and register on the login page.
A: You need a stable network to download apps. In case of download failures, it is recommended to try it later or change the network access mode.
Q: Why it prompts error in resolving a package when an app is being installed?

A: Please identify the model, OS and internal storage space of current device and whether they match the app. If the error occurs while you are updating an app, it is recommended to uninstall the version prior to the update in App Management, and install it later.
Q: Why an installed app was forced to shut down when opened?

"A: Prior to running the app, please clean up memory using apps such as Phone Manager and reboot the device. If it doesn't help, please try to change the install location of the app: SD card or phone internal storage (You can complete the settings in phone's Settings - Application)."
Q: What you can do with a Lenovo ID?
A: Lenovo ID can be used to mark favorite and buy paid apps in LenovoStore, and login all Le-series products.
Q: After an app is downloaded and installed, what can I do if the start icon cannot be found?

A: If it is a normal app, please try to reboot your device. If it is a widget, please cilck Add widegt in Widget menu. If it is a wallpaper app, please open it in System settings-Display and sensor settings - Wallpaper settings - Select a desktop wallpaper.
Q: Why cannot I run an installed game? And it prompts to require hundreds of MB data package?

A: Besides APK, some large games also require downloading the data package at varied sizes. It is recommended to download it in WLAN or 3G based on actual conditions. Or you can download the data package on PC and import the downloaded file to your device. In addition, the download links may be provided in some app details.

"Product introduction: Dingding Live is a phone app offering life services. It serves as a close life assistant catered to urban population and is promoted by www.ddmap.com, the largest local location and map website in China. Through this app, you can: search for the most accurate traffic route transfer plan, the neighboring stations, bus and subway service time; quickly view the information and users' comments on more than 1 million nearby businesses including restaurants, banks, hotels and cafes; download nearly 10,000 coupons and discount information for various areas in China! Besides, the app also has a built-in signing-in and Weibo sync function so that you can learn the most latest trend and stay updated of the most brilliant activities in Shanghai. Function: 1. Provide accurate and practical bus and subway transfer plans and self-driving routes; 2. Provide location and business information on nearby public transportation stations, restaurants, places of leisure and entertainment, banks, hotels and gas stations; 3. Provide downloading of nearly 10,000 coupons covering catering, entertainment, shopping and life services for various places in China; 4. Built-in signning-in services, sharing footprints to Weibo and take part in wonderful local activities; 5. Synchronize to Sina Weibo to share your shinning moments with your friends. 6. Community: covering push services, hot rankings, street snaps and the three hot groups of local cities. The cities include: Shanghai, Nanjing, Hangzhou, Suzhou, Guangzhou, Wuhan, Shenzhen, Beijing, Tianjin, Chengdu, Chongqing, Jinan, Nanchang, Guiyang, Harbin, Ningbo, Qingdao, Wuxi, Fuzhou, Xi'an, Changchun, Taiyuan, Sanya, Wenzhou, Changsha, Zhengzhou, Shenyang, Kunming, Dalian, Xiamen, Hefei, Changzhou, Guilin, Haikou, Nanning, Shaoxing, Xuzhou, Yangzhou, Zhenjiang, Macao, Dongguan, Foshan, Hohhot, Jiaxing, Lanzhou, Nantong, Shijiazhuang, Urumqi, Xining, Hong Kong and Zhuhai"

"You haven't enabled the Lenovo User Experience Program. After you quit from the store, the background service will be halted."

"Thank you for choosing a Lenovo mobile device! Please read the following articles carefully before enabling the User Experience Improvement Program on this device. Services that we provide through a mobile communication network online data center or via the Internet, according to the provisions in this user experience improvement program (hereinafter referred to as the Program), and all information, functions, content, software, hardware or services involved that we directly provide in this program are collectively called Services. This program is signed between you and Beijing Lenovo FM Technology Limited (hereinafter referred to as we or our party). According to the context, in this program, we sometimes may include our vendors, service providers, clients or staffs. While you refers to any institution and individual that agrees to take part in or use the Services. 1. Definition and Description The User Experience Improvement Program is a service we offer for Lenovo mobile devices. It is intended improve products or services and enhance the user experience. After enabling User Experience Improvement Program on your mobile device, you will enjoy the priority to try new services of the program while retaining the original functions of the mobile device. Accelerated software and hardware performance and enhanced user experience (1) Faster and smoother startup through boot optimization and acceleration; (2) Easy and convenient functions most popular among users; (3) Improved GPS enabling faster and more accurate positioning; (4) Intelligent identification and switching of network modes (3G, WLAN, etc.) offering you customized Internet content with minimum 3G data usage and rock-bottom fees;
Recommendations for a range of personalized content: (1) When you are battling it out in a game, we offer you download links and news about the latest games you are likely to be interested in; (2) When you are immersed in music, we offer you updates and news about the singers and their concerts and new releases; (3) When you are enjoying your mobile office, we offer you the most up-to-date and popular office software and trials; (4) When you are surfing on the Internet, we offer you safe and fast access, and automatically recommend personalized content and multimedia audio-visual feasts that you are interested in, including the latest software, games, news, e-books, music and videos; (5) When you are using positioning or navigation services, we provide position-based recommendations and retrieve services for the basic necessities in life, as well as offering more accurate and efficient GPS services;
Safe and reliable software and service experience; (1) A rating/scoring system ensures better and safer built-in apps; (2) One-stop search, download, installation and uninstallation of apps allows you to immediately experience the most popular apps and games; (3) Customize your personal storage cloud which brings unlimited data sharing among compatible phones, PCs, tablets and even multimedia TVs, helping you shake off worries about data loss. You expressly understand and agree that we only provide you with a convenient service aimed only at optimization, improvement or personalized support for functions existing in your mobile devices. Specific services or information could be supplied by other third parties. We neither take the place of any supplier to provide this kind of services or information nor give any warranty, including but not limited to, warranties for the security, stability, timeliness and applicability thereof. Should you have any questions, disagreements, comments or suggestions about the content, please contact the content provider directly. We assume no liability to you in this regard. We reserve the right to adjust the content and modes of the Service (including, but not limited to, the terms of the Service) as necessary. The content or modes of the Services thus adjusted, or the brief introduction and/or function description based thereon, will become an integral part of this Agreement and you will be notified of such adjustments through our commercial efforts. While you are enjoying the Services, please check and agree with the adjusted terms of the Services from time to time. We may take technological means or other measures to protect the Service, to ensure that the Service complies with the requirements of relevant laws and policies, to protect our suppliers, customers and employees, or to prevent you from violating the Program. These measures include. but are not limited to, controlling your use of the Service, which may prevent or interrupt your use of the Service.
2. How do I Obtain the Service? To enjoy the Services, you should: (a) Keep your mobile device connected to a reliable mobile network/Internet; (b) Activate corresponding function module, such as push service and GPS; and (c) Subscribe to this Program in accordance with Article 3 hereof. You can use the Service according to the terms of the Program only when the foregoing conditions are met. 3. Subscription You may not use the Service unless you have accepted the terms and conditions of this Program. You must be of the age of legal capacity as stipulated by applicable laws to subscribe to this Program; otherwise, the subscription must be completed by your parent or legal guardian. The following acts will indicate that you have understood and accepted the terms and conditions of this Program: (a) Clicking on the I Agree or I Accept button confirms you agree with or accept the online version of this Program; (b) Our receipt of the hardcopy version of this Program for offline subscription; or (c) Actual use of the Service (including any third-party service provided together with the Service). Please do not use the Service if you disagree with the terms and conditions of the Program. 4. Service Period and Service Fee So far, though the Services under this Agreement remain free, we reserve the right to charge service fees in the future. If we plan to do so, you will be informed in advance. In such cases, only after you have paid for relevant services as required (Subscribe) will we provide the Services within a specific period (Service Period). We have the right to adjust the fees on a case-by-case basis. The service fees shall not include any expenses incurred due to your access to the Internet or mobile network. Regardless of whether the Services are provided on a paid basis, you are reponsible for any expenses payable to a third party including the telecom operator as a result of your use of the Services, such as telephone bill or SMS bill, expenses for accesses to other Internet services and costs on online shopping of other apps, audio/video contents, service or products. 5. How to Use the Services? When using the Services, you shall: Abide by applicable laws including applicable international treaties or conventions; Comply with all the agreements, principles, provisions, procedures or notices in connection with the Services; Immediately notify us of any illegal use of or security vulnerability in your Lenovo account that you have become aware of.
6. Prohibitions When using the Services, you are prohibited to: Use the Services to engage in any activity that may have an adverse effect on the normal operation of the Internet or mobile network; Use the Services to infringe the intellectual property rights or any other legal rights or interests of others; Use the Services in such a manner that may impair interests or reputation of us or our affiliates, dealers, distributors and/or suppliers, or the interests or reputation of any clients thereof (collectively referred to as we, us or our); affiliate in the Program refers to any entity which is controlled by, in control of, or under common control with us. As used herein, entity refers to any company, enterprise or other legal entity; Control, for purposes of this definition, means directly or indirectly having the ability to influence management of the subject entity through ownership, voting-right shares, contracts or other measures. Engage in or promote any illegal activity by using the Services; Use any part of the Services as a target link to any unsolicited bulk or commercial information (junk e-mail); Access and/or use the Services through any automatic process or service; Edit or change the connection to, or attempt to edit or change the connection to the Services through unauthorized means; Damage or destroy the Services (or any network connected to the Services), cause failures or overload of the Services, or disrupt any other party's use and enjoyment of the Services; or Resell or redistribute the Services or any part of the Services.
7. Consequence of Violation If you violate any provision of this Program when using the Services, we have the right to require you to remedy such violation or directly take corresponding measures which include but are not limited to: (a) Suspend the Services to you and/or (b) Terminate the Services to you to minimize the influence of your misconduct. Any penalty, investigation, accusation, claim or demand resulted from or incurred by your conducts shall be settled by youself at your own expense, and any loss and liability arising therefrom shall be solely borne by you. You shall immediately, at your own expense, defend and hold harmless us and our affiliates (us includes our suppliers, clients or employees) against any penalty, investigation, accusation, claim or demand initiated by any third party due to your conducts upon your receipt of our notice. In addition, we reserve the right to claim compensation against you for any loss sustained by us due to your conduct. 8. Change of Services You understand and agree that, we need to regularly or irregularly examine, maintain and update the Services’ platforms or relevant equipment to better meet clients’ demand, update our products or perform technical improvement. For any interruption of the Services for a reasonable period due to such reasons aforementioned, we promise to make reasonable efforts to inform you in advance, but we shall not be responsible for any inconvenience and loss arising therefrom. Considering the specificity and unpredictability of network services, you agree that the Services or any part thereof may have to be changed, suspended or terminated at any time for various reasons. We will make commercially reasonable efforts to send a prior notice of such changes, suspension or termination where practicable, but we are not obligated to send such notice. You can disable the User Experience Improvement Program in Settings of your device at any time. After the Program is disabled, there will be no information exchange between your mobile device and the server of the Program and you are no longer eligible for corresponding functions and services. Upon the termination of the Services for whatever reason, your right to use the Services will be terminated accordingly. 9. Intellectual Property We or the third party reserves all the rights, ownships or interests of the Services, any part thereof or the software and any text, image, graph, audio and/or video provided through or along with the Services (“Materials”), including but not limited to all the intellectual property rights. These Materials are protected by laws on copyright, trademark and/or other property ownership. You agree not to modify, adapt, translate, produce derivative works from, decompile, reverse engineer or disassemble, or attempt through other ways to derive source code from the Services or the Materials, or extract a substantial part thereof for any other application. You also agree not to remove, obscure or alter the copyright notice, trademark or other proprietary right notice by us or any third party, attached to or contained in the Services or accessed together with or through the Services. Intellectual Property Rights means any and all rights available from time to time under patent law, copyright law, trade secret law, trademark law and anti-unfair competition law now or hereafter in force and effect worldwide and any and all other proprietary rights, and any and all applications, renewals, extensions and restorations thereof. Unless otherwise expressly specified herein, no content in this Program shall be construed as the assignment by a party to the other party of any copyright, patent, trade secret, trademark or other intellectual property rights held thereby. 10. Information Collection and Protection
If you participate in the User Experience Improvement Program, we will synchronize the running data in your mobile device on an irregular basis to fulfill, collaborate and better provide the Services, including device on/off events, push service on/off events, WLAN on/off events, GPS on/off events and data, operator informaiton, system function and usage, app on/off events, app install/uninstall events and device running data (key functions, exception and errors).
In the Program, all the running data of the synchronized device is anonymously collected. All the synchronized data of the mobile device will be encrypted and stored on dedicated servers for a maximum period of one year. At the same time, the data will be protected in accordance with our privacy policy. You can visit http://www.lenovo.com.cn/Public/public_bottom/privacy.shtml to read and understand the details of our privacy strategy. In addition, we may access, use or disclose related data and information of yours only for the following purposes: (a) To analyze anonymously the running status and app/function usage of the device to locate problems in the device and app operation as the basis for improving products or service functions, enhancing user experience and providing the services listed in Article 1 of this Program. (b) To comply with laws or assist in investigation and enforcement by a judicial and/or law enforcement authority; (c) To protect the properties and legitimate rights of ourselves and our clients, including implementation of the Program and compliance with the strategies applicable to the Services; or (d) To protect the rights, properties or safety of the public. However, as there are certain security risks arising from providing and transmitting related data over the network, you have fully comprehended and are willing to bear such risks. Therefore, you hereby confirm to undertake the consequences of information leakage caused by network transmission. We are not liable for the data loss arising beyond our control or without our fault. 11. Limited Warranties We warrant that we will provide the Services in a professional manner consistent with de facto standards in this industry. You shall inform us of any inconsistency between the Services provided by us and this warranty within ninety (90) days since the Services are provided. You understand and agree that what we provide under this Program are services, rather than goods. Therefore, we have made no warranty or representation with regard to the Services other than those set forth hereinabove and hereby disclaim any other warranties or conditions, whether express or implied, including but not limited to those with respect to the implied warranties of merchantability, application to a particular purpose and non-infringement. You understand that the Services are provided based on constantly developing technologies and in reliance upon telecommunication, Internet and other third-party services and, therefore, may fail to satisfy the users' demands due to disruption, delay or other problems to the Services, caused by unstable factors including but not limited to force majeure, computer virus or hacker attack, unstable system, user's location, user's device shutdown, or breakdown of GSM network, Internet, 3G network or telecommunication line. All of such risks shall be solely borne by users of the Services. We make no absolute warranty on the promptness, security or accuracy of the Services, and bear no liability for failure of timely and accurate storage, sending, receipt and reading of data, or any other similar problems caused by the aforesaid factors. You will decide whether to use the Services at your sole discretion and bear all the liabilities arising from such decision. If applicable laws prohibit the exclusion of some implied warranties by contracts, then to the greatest extent prohibited by such applicable laws, the above exclusion of implied warranties does not apply to you, and you may continue to enjoy the rights which are so prohibited to be excluded or restricted by contracts. 12. Limitation of Liabilities If the Services provided by us are inconsistent with the above warranty, we will make commercially reasonable efforts to correct the errors and re-provide the Services. If we are unable to materially correct any error therein in a commercially reasonable manner, you may terminate the Services and demand to refund a reasonable proportion of your advance payment. The foregoing has set out all the remedies available to you and all liabilities to be borne by us for such inconsistency. Notwithstanding any other provisions of this Program, we bear no liability or obligation for: (a) Any amount exceeding the total service fees received by us hereunder (if any); (b) Any cost and expense incurred for obtaining substitute goods, technologies, services or rights; or (c) Expense, expense increase or loss incurred due to the interruption or delay of the Services or the damage or loss of data, whether based on this Program or any contract, negligence, strict liabilities or any other legal principle, even if we have received a prior notice about the possibility of compensation for damages above mentioned. We will in no case be liable for any indirect, incidental or consequential damage or loss of profit. If laws of your country or region prohibit the exclusion or limitation of some liabilities by contract, then to the greatest extent prohibited by such law, the above liability limitation or exclusion provisions shall not apply to you. 13. Amendment Without prejudice to your material right to enjoy the Services, we reserve the right to amend the provisions of this Program as necessary. We will provide a reasonably prior notice of any amendment to this Program via (a) Webpage announcement; (b) E-mail; (c) Push; and/or (c) SMS. Please read the up-to-date version of this Program at http://lenovomm.com (or any other website otherwise provided by us) from time to time to learn about any amendment hereto. If you do not accept any amendment to this Program, please cancel and cease your use of the Services before such amendment comes into force. If you do not cease your use of the Services, you shall use the Services in accordance with the provisions of this Program so amended. 14. Termination, Effects of Termination The Program shall become effective as of the agreed effective date, and shall remain valid until it is terminated by either party hereto. Upon the termination of this Program due to the expiry of its term or for any other reason, the [Intellectual Property Rights], [Limited Warranties], [Limitation of Liabilities], [Information Collection and Protection], [Termination, Effects of Termination] and other provisions of this Program that shall survive based on their nature shall survive and remain in force and effect until they have been fully performed. 15. Construction Should any provision of this Program is held invalid or unenforceable in whole or in part for whatever reason, the parties hereto shall replace such provision with a provision that can best reflect the intention of such invalid or unenforceable provision, and the remaining provisions of this Program shall remain valid and binding. This Program shall constitute the entire agreement between the parties hereto on the subject matter of this Program and other relevant matters, and shall supersede any prior agreement or representation on your use of the Services. The headings herein are provided only for convenience and shall not affect the construction of this Program. In case of any discrepancy between this Program and User Registration Protocol of Lenovo Account, this Program shall prevail. 16. Assignment We may assign or subcontract this Program in whole or in part at any time with or without prior notice to fulfill or better provide services. You shall not assign this Program or any part hereof to any other person. Any assignment made by you shall be null and void. You shall not assign your right to use the Services or any part of the Services to any other person, whether permanently or temporarily. 17. No Third-party Beneficiary This Program shall only inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and shall not inure to the benefit of any third party other than the permitted successors or assignees. 18. Governing Law This Program shall be concluded and construed in accordance with the applicable laws of the mainland of the People’s Republic of China (excluding Hong Kong and Macao). Any dispute and conflict arising from or in connection with the performance and interpretation of this Program shall be submitted to a court having jurisdiction at the place where we domicile for ruling. 19. Trademark “Legend”, “Lenovo”, “Lenovo联想”, “联想” and other logos of Lenovo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Lenovo (Beijing) Limited or its affiliates in mainland China and/or other countries or regions. Other products, trade names and trademarks referred to herein are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. Any reference of such products, trade names and trademarks is for explanation only and does not indicate any relevance between the Services and the said company or organization owning such trademarks. We reserve all rights that are not expressly granted hereunder. "
